summary: The module implements video compositing capabilities, allowing multiple video clips to be combined into a single output clip. It manages layer ordering, positioning, mask application, background handling (color or transparency), and automatically derives the composite clipâ€™s duration and frame rate from its components.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to programmatically build complex video compositions, facilitating tasks such as overlaying footage, adding graphics, and preparing final video assets for production or distribution.
